review.title: “IT IS VERY NICE EXPERIENCE TO WORK WITH SYKES & RAY EQUITIES I LTD”
review.pros: Pros – Best reason is that i like to work in capita & commodity market
review.cons: Cons – Getting very less salarynot satisfied with current salary
review.advice-to-management: Advice to Senior Management – please do increment in salary of those employee who work really hard
